This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Java Edition Classic]] releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with Pre-Classic releases.

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Creeper]]
|[[File:Creeper JE2.png|84px]]
|Everywhere
|None
|Melee attacks players and explodes when killed. Will take damage and eventually die (and thus explode) when touching the player.
|-
|[[Pig]]
|[[File:Pig JE1.png|84px]]
|Everywhere
|{{Drop|Block|Brown Mushroom|0|2}}
|The first passive mob.
|-
|[[Skeleton]]
|[[File:Skeleton JE1.png|84px]]
|Everywhere
|None, but will spawn 4-6 arrows upon death that CAN be picked up and used.
|Attacks by shooting purple arrows. These cannot be picked up. Will not retaliate against other skeleton's shots unlike other mobs.
|-
|[[Zombie]]
|[[File:Zombie JE1.png|84px]]
|Everywhere
|None
|Melee attacks players.
|-
|[[Spider]]
|[[File:Spider JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|Everywhere
|None
|Melee attacks players.
|-
|[[Sheep]]
|[[File:White Sheep JE1.png|84px]]
|Everywhere
|{{Drop|Block|Brown Mushroom|0|2}}
|Drops white cloth when punched. Glitches exist in these versions in which magenta or red cloth may be dropped.
|}

{|{{Simple Guide table|New Blocks}}

|[[File:Bedrock JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Generates at the bottom of the world.
|Cannot be broken.

|[[File:Water JE4.png|84px]]

|[[File:Lava JE6.png|84px]]

|Generates near water

== Gameplay ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Multiplayer]]
|Multiple players can now join the same world together and interact with each other.
|-
|[[Health]]
|It is now possible to take damage, heal yourself, and die. You cannot respawn yet.
|}
